channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical Ltd. -- cloud-init
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical Ltd. -- cloud-init

item.title: CVE-2023-1786|2024-08-02T05:57:25.074Z -- canonical%20ltd. -- cloud-init
item.description: Sensitive data could be exposed in logs of cloud-init before version 23.1.2. An attacker could use this information to find hashed passwords and possibly escalate their privilege.
